pabbathapade, paw payekhi; ghanawayo gamo, galawas gamek - boho jana wasana gamekya yu seyi; yawa arahaththa, rahathpala awasankota; nanaggarasena, nan kotasi resen; yathapasukatatanan, yatha suwa thawakata wasasa wasatatanan, waswisiya yuthu thanak; bhawanissaranan hewen kasawimak - bhawa sanhindawimak ew; pamada wara sihi wuhutu piyow; attamahaniraya, “sanyjiwo kalasuthethacha- sandaghathowewa roruwo athaparo mamaha wiwi - thapano cha pathapano” yana ata maha niruhu; padanupadikan, piyanupiyawa; satena, salakhu wisin- nathi guna athi bandu kota hangawanwakhu wisin yu seyi; nohoth satena selen- ‘sateyye na’ yu seyi.
